about_the_game:
The "B" stands for BONUS! Jam to extra tracks from Tango Gameworks' rhythm-action hit, Hi-Fi RUSH!

  • Includes over a dozen new songs!
  • Hi-Fi RUSH composers Shuichi Kobori, Masatoshi Yanagi and John Johanas return!
  • As heard in the Arcade Challenge! Update!
  • Exclamation points!
detailed_description:
The "B" stands for BONUS! Jam to extra tracks from Tango Gameworks' rhythm-action hit, Hi-Fi RUSH!

  • Includes over a dozen new songs!
  • Hi-Fi RUSH composers Shuichi Kobori, Masatoshi Yanagi and John Johanas return!
  • As heard in the Arcade Challenge! Update!
  • Exclamation points!

name: Hi-Fi RUSH B-Sides

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 735 MB available space

short_description: The "B" stands for BONUS! Jam to extra tracks from Tango Gameworks' rhythm-action hit, Hi-Fi RUSH! Featuring Shuichi Kobori, Masatoshi Yanagi and John Johanas, this soundtrack contains over a dozen new songs from the Arcade Challenge! Update!
